title: What is React?
content: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces. It is maintained by Facebook and a community of developers.

title: What is an Accordion?
content: An accordion is a vertically stacked list of items where each item can be expanded to reveal more information.

title: Why use JSON for data?
content: JSON (JavaScript Object Notation) is lightweight and easy to use. It's widely used for data exchange between a server and a client.

title: How do you use state in React?
content: State in React is a built-in object that stores property values that belong to a component. It's used to manage dynamic data in a React app.
